Author: GitHub
Description:
Instantly give GitHub Copilot the full context of your repository. In this video, we show you how to use the new "Generate instructions" feature. With a single click, the Copilot coding agent will analyze your codebase and create a custom instructions file for you, leading to more accurate and helpful AI assistance.

#GitHub #AI #Developer

Title: Create GitHub Copilot instructions in just one click
